overview: Anjie Roldan joined CardioFocus, Inc. in 2001 as Controller and was promoted to Vice President of Finance and Administration in 2007. Prior to joining CardioFocus, Ms. Roldan was the Accounting Manager for Logistics.com, an ICG company. She has spent most of her career with start-up companies assisting with financing efforts, mergers and acquisitions and growth positioning. Ms. Roldan received her B.S. from Johnson & Wales University and her M.B.A. from Bryant College.

relationships.title: Vice President of Finance and Administration
